relation: Dates (YYYY-MM-DD) of instances to add attendance
ID(s) of event instances to add attendance
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {160780=Example Request: GET http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/events/81300/attendance, 83721=All dates should be specified as YYYY-MM-DD (2013-09-20). The maximum date range supported is 365 days. Longer ranges will be truncated to 365 days from start., 143281=Example Request: GET http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/events/81300/activity, 164169=Example Request: POST http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/events/81300/attendance?dates=2013-09-20, 165885=Example Request: DELETE http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/events/81300/attendance?dates=2013-09-20, 155815=Example Request: GET http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/events/81300/attendees, 278977=© 2015 Localist Corporation. textBeforeTable: Returns a paged listing of organizations on this calendar. Resource: GET /organizations List The organization’s URL slug urlname The organization’s time zone time_zone URL to the organization’s photo photo_url ID of the organization’s photo, if set photo_id The organization’s name name URL to the organization’s page on Localist localist_url The organization’s ID (this is referenced as school_id in other resources) id The organization’s description description Description Attribute "photo_url""http://images-cf.localist.com/images/main/person_huge.png""localist_url""http://events.wtmd.org/""photo_id"null"time_zone""Eastern Time (US & Canada)""description"null"urlname""wtmd""name""WTMD""id"55"organization" {  Format An organization is the root level that all content is attached to. A calendar always has one organization. Organizations Note: All output samples have been reformatted for clarity, and some responses and values have been truncated. Describes the available resources, their response formats, and associated methods. Variables in resource URLs are listed in all capital letters. Resources } } : : , : , : , : , : , : , : , : { Timestamp when the
textAfterTable: Example Request: GET http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/organizations { "organizations": [ { "organization": { "id": 55, "name": "WTMD", "urlname": "wtmd", "description": null, "time_zone": "Eastern Time (US & Canada)", "photo_id": null, "localist_url": "http://events.wtmd.org/", "photo_url": "http://images-cf.localist.com/images/main/person_huge.png" } } ], "page": { "current": 1, "size": 10, "total": 1 } } Get Resource: GET /organizations/ORGANIZATION_ID Retrieve details about one organization. Example Request: GET http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/organizations/55 { "organization": { "id": 55, "name": "WTMD", "urlname": "wtmd", "description": null, "time_zone": "Eastern Time (US & Canada)", "photo_id": null, "localist_url": "http://events.wtmd.org/", "photo_url": "http://images-cf.localist.com/images/main/person_huge.png" } } Communities List Resource: GET /organizations/ORGANIZATION_ID/communities Returns a paged listing of the communities associated with this organization. Example Request: GET http://CALENDAR-URL/api/2/organziations/11/communities
